mosinstall.name: Iframe Content
mosinstall.author: Nguyen Hoang Viet
mosinstall.description:
Use Guidance:


For setting of height and the URL to be framed, set the "Frame Height" and "URL To show" accordingly.

To use simply put {iframe height="400" frameborder="1"}http://luyenkim.net{/iframe} in the content page and you have full width iframe housing the web site or content within it.

You can override any parameters such src, width, height, scrolling, frameborder, name, align info in the first {iframe ...} statement.

param.name: src
param.label: URL To Show
param.description: Type in the full URL like http://www.abc.com. Or relative url help/help.html

param.name: width
param.label: Frame Width
param.description: Type in the width of your frame in pixels or %.

param.name: height
param.label: Frame Height
param.description: Type in the height of your frame in pixels.

param.name: frameborder
param.label: Frameborder
param.description: Specifies whether or not to display a frame border.

param.name: name
param.label: Frame Name
param.description: Specifies a unique name of the iframe (to use in scripts).

param.name: align
param.label: Align
param.description: Specifies how to align the iframe according to the surrounding text

param.name: text
param.label: Info about link
param.description: Extra information - Helpful for Google. See demo for details.

param.name: text2
param.label: Text2
param.description: Extra information - Helpful for Google. See demo for details
